wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Patrick Sloane (born March 1956) is a British hedge fund manager. He is the co-founder of Sloane Robinson, headquartered in the City of London.

link_mentions.page: List of Honorary Fellows of Lincoln College, Oxford

response: In 1993, with Hugh Sloane, Robinson co-founded Sloane Robinson, a hedge fund with its headquarters in the City of London. He was still a Director in 2012. He also serves on the Advisory Board of Cerno Capital.
